actions.committee: Committee on Science, and in addition to the Committee on Resources, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned
actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Science, and in addition to the Committee on Resources, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Mineral Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Space and Aeronautics.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Energy and Mineral Resources

official_title: To authorize funding for the development, launch, and operation of a Synthetic Aperture Radar satellite in support of a national energy policy.

summary.text: Authorizes appropriations to: (1) the National Aeronautics and Space Administration for the development and deployment of a multifrequency Synthetic Aperture Radar satellite in support of a national energy policy; and (2) the U.S. Geological Survey for Command, Control, Data Processing, Archiving, and Distribution of data from the satellite through the EROS Data Center in Sioux Falls, South Dakota.

titles.title: To authorize funding for the development, launch, and operation of a Synthetic Aperture Radar satellite in support of a national energy policy.
